login.masterPasswordPlaceholder: Shared company password for vault encryption
login.masterPasswordTooltip: This is a client-side password that should be shared with all users in your organization. Rediacc never stores or has access to this password, ensuring your vault data remains secure and private. Leave empty if vault encryption is not enabled.

errors.masterPasswordRequired: Your organization uses client-side encryption for sensitive data. Please enter the shared encryption password provided by your administrator.
errors.invalidMasterPassword: Incorrect encryption password. Please verify with your administrator that you have the correct client-side password for your organization.
errors.companyNotEncrypted: Your company has not enabled vault encryption yet. The master password you entered will not be used.

twoFactorAuth.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactorAuth.description: Please enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
